title: One of the greatest movie
review: Before i thaught this movie might be moderate but my thaught was wrong,this movie stole every body's attention from its begining till its end.. Dont miss it..

title: Moderate content
review: Though this movie is about space but lacks mouth watering scene of space which is biggest disadvantages being a science fiction movie. Performance wise movie is good could have been better. Acting and story is plus point of this movie.

title: One of the best VFX movie
review: Far better than Marvel's Avenger infinity war. Visual effects is awesome including direction,acting,action sequence, cinematography,story etc... Full entertainment package AQUAMAN.

title: Excellent lion kingdom
review: This movie is out from this world which provides amazing super feeling within its running time.Whole team of this movie did their best to entertain people and they 100%succeeded. Wow wow wow..

title: Outstanding movie
review: What an epic movie according to performance of every crew, must not miss this movie.

title: WoW
review: This movie is a master piece. What a brilliant performance by lead actor Mr.phoenix
